text: Nɨ mɨgɨrɨgɨar ifavaribar gumazim gasɨva a isɨ kotiam darɨghan markɨ. Egh gumazir aghuarim arazir kuratam damighan koghtɨ, ia isɨ kotiam datɨghɨva, nɨ puram a mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghan markɨ. Guizbangɨra, gumazir arazir kurar kam gamim, an osɨmtɨzim ikɨvɨra ikɨtɨ kɨ a isɨ kotiam datɨghtɨ, an ovengam.
